member.name: T:PoshKentico.Core.Providers.General.KenticoCmsApplicationService
member.summary: Implementation of that uses Kentico.

member.name: P:PoshKentico.Core.Providers.General.KenticoCmsApplicationService.InitializationState
member.summary: Gets the initialization state of the CMS Application.

member.name: M:PoshKentico.Core.Providers.General.KenticoCmsApplicationService.FindSite(System.Action{System.String},System.Action{System.String})
member.summary:
This method requires administrator access.
Finds a Kentico website by performing the following steps: 1. Get a list of all the sites from IIS 2. Get a list of all applications from the sites 3. Get a list of all the virtual directories from the applications 4. Continue processing virtual directory if a web.config file exits 5. Parse the document and find an "add" node with name="CMSConnectionString" 6. If the connection string is valid, then stop processing. This is a Kentico site.
member.param: A delegate for writing to the debug stream.
A delegate for writing to the verbose stream.
member.returns: The directory and the connection string for the Kentico site.

member.name: M:PoshKentico.Core.Providers.General.KenticoCmsApplicationService.Initialize(System.Boolean,System.Action{System.String},System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Initialize Kentico CMS Application using FindKenticoSite or a cached version to locate the site.
member.param: Use the cached location for the Kentico Site. When true and have already found Kentico in a previous run, this method does not require admin.
A delegate for writing to the debug stream.
A delegate for writing to the verbose stream.

member.name: M:PoshKentico.Core.Providers.General.KenticoCmsApplicationService.Initialize(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.String,System.Action{System.String},System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Initialize Kentico CMS Application using the supplied parameters.
member.param: The directory where the Kentico site resides.
The connection string to use for initializing the CMS Application.
A delegate for writing to the debug stream.
A delegate for writing to the verbose stream.

A delegate for writing to the verbose stream.

member.summary: Locates and performs the necessary initialization for the CMS site.

A delegate for writing to the verbose stream.
